scan_for_matter_in(matter='all', hop=1)[source]¶

Scanning for particles, tiles, or location on a given hop distance

Parameters:
  • matter – For what matter this method should scan for. Can be either particles, tiles, locations, or (default)all
  • hop – The hop distance from thee actual position of the scanning particle
Returns:

A list of the founded matters

write_to_with(matter, key=None, data=None)[source]¶

Writes data with given a keyword directly on the matters (paricle, tile, or location object) memory

Parameters:
  • matter – The matter can be either a particle, tile, or location
  • key – A string keyword so to order the data that is written into the memory
  • data – The data that should be stored into the memory
Returns:

True: Successful written into the memory; False: Unsuccessful
